title: Prosecutors hold news conference on arrest of Giuliani’s Ukraine associates
text: While The President claims he's the one fighting corruption in Ukraine, two associates of his personal attorney Rudy Giuliani have now been arrested and accused of corruption themselves. Katy Tur discusses the arrests and following indictments with NBC News Correspondent Ken Dilanian, NBC News Correspondent Geoff Bennett, Reuters White House Correspondent Jeff Mason, Former U.S. Assistant Attorney for the Southern District of New York Mimi Rocah, and Former Senior Counsel for the investigation into President Clinton, Paul Rosenzweig.
